data.eml:eml: A new species of the New Caledonian endemic genus Xantho­ chorema Kimmins, 1953 (Insecta: Trichoptera: Hydrobiosidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Johanson, Kjell Arne (2002): A new species of the New Caledonian endemic genus Xantho­ chorema Kimmins, 1953 (Insecta: Trichoptera: Hydrobiosidae). Zootaxa 42: 1-6, DOI: 10.5072/zenodo.155654
